::Firearm::

Firearm nods. "I hope he does. We'll get them all back, and you guys will return to your times."

He sighs at the news of the deaths and the missing members, but he hoped the city would help that. "We'll have one heck of a time fixing all this, but its not just our problem. If time gets screwed over this much, anything can happen."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:::
> 
> Ratchet: Casualties? Well, Sky Lynx got smashed by Abominus.
> Sideswipe: Yeah. I miss him already.
> Orion: He may have been arrogant, but he was a good warrior. hey, wait a 
> minute, where are Torca and Klant?
> Ratchet: I overheard them talking about leaving.  I guess they did. Hope they 
> end up okay.
> Sideswipe: I got a question for you Firearm.  When the war is over, how are 
> going to fix things? I mean, in our time here, we've screwed up so much.  
> Just me and Ratchet being here is a paradox, and there are other former 
> Autobots and Decepticons here too. Then there's the Ark. Liono Prime had 
> better know what he is doing.
